subject: Per test fixture?
msgSnippet: Hi! What is the recommended way to setup test data for one test method only? Just do it at the beginning of the test method? Example: public void setUp() { //
messageBody:
Hi!

What is the recommended way to setup test data for one test method
only? Just do it at the beginning of the test method?

Example:

public void setUp()
{
// common setup
}


public void testOne()
{
setUpForTest1(); // stuff only needed for this test

// do the testing 1....
}

public void testTwo()
{
setUpForTest2();

// do the testing 2....
}


Or is there special support from JUnit for this?

Regards,
David
